  1. 310-312

    Nov 11, 2011

    Busy start to the week, mainly taken up by processing lots of photos I took of a friend of a friend as Darth Maul for some potential work for him with Lucas Film. I was so busy doing that I forgot to take any photos at all on Wednesday...

  2. 309: November 5th

    Nov 6, 2011

    Because fireworks are crap, here's an overexposed & cropped picture of a deer/stag through a fence.

  4. 305: The local cats

    Nov 3, 2011

    My first nighttime photo wander. I have a feeling there will be a few more of these to come before the end of the year, so I'm really glad I have this f1.8 lens.

    Just before he fell backwards off the wall.
